 2024-08622024-07-05PMO
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisReappointment of DONALD JOSEPH SAVOIE, C.C., O.N.B., of Moncton, New Brunswick, as a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as an ad hoc provincial member of the Independent Advisory Board for Senate Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of DONALD JOSEPH SAVOIE, C.C., O.N.B., of Moncton, New Brunswick, as a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as an ad hoc provincial member of the Independent Advisory Board for Senate Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years.
